# ZStackContent3D

**Structure**

A type that adds spacing to a [doc://com.apple.SwiftUI/documentation/SwiftUI/ZStack].

## Declaration

```swift
@frozen struct ZStackContent3D<Content> where Content : View
```

## Overview

You don’t create this type directly. SwiftUI creates it for you when you use the `ZStack(alignment:spacing:content)` initializer.

## Initializers

- **init(spacing:content:)**

## Instance Properties

- **content**
- **spacing**

## Conforms To

- Copyable
- View
title: ZStackContent3D
